name: 3 Minutes to Die
description:
Your name is Agent Marcov. You have been poisoned by Horken agents in an attempt to get you out of the way. Defeat all the Horken agents all while you collect clocks to reduce the poisons effects. If you delay the inevitable and manage to end Horken's rule over the world, you WIN! But if your timer runs out or a Horken agent captures you, you LOSE.

Instructions : 

WASD to move and press Space to dash
